name: Percussionanza
description:
A mobile/desktop rhythm game where beats rain down towards drum emblems where they can be hit to gain points.

Keyboard controls during gameplay - Z, X, C, space, M, comma(,<), period(.>)

The game starts with 2 levels, achieving 100 points will unlock a third and achieving 200 points will unlock all 4.

The game was developed in Godot and the art was procedurally generated as well as some of the beat timings during gameplay are also procedural.
